TopicTitle: K-Kar 2.0 Fast, durable, jeb proof car!

Articles.Content:
K-Kar 2.0

![ZDUjA0J.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZDUjA0J.png)

(Massive props to blackrack and his [scatterer mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115408))

I made this for a challenge a while ago, and I recently drug it back out of the bleak depths of my craft folder.

Originally it was RCS powered, but I removed that for the release, it's totally un-flippable, and Jeb proof!\*

It's fast (23 M/S) and durable!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ruwyg)

Enjoy!

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/K-Kar-20)

\*Warranty void if driven by Jeb

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T03:14:37Z" title="06/27/2015 03:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

Nice! I like how it is very hard to tip over. +Rep 

BTW: I absolutely love scatterer. As soon as it becomes more reliable and has less bugs, I will be using it very often.

EDIT: An update for scatterer came out; I am now using it regularly.
